name: Soulstealer Blade
description: A dark and menacing blade that has the power to steal the souls of its victims.
looks: The Soulstealer Blade has a blade forged from blackened steel, emitting a faint aura of darkness. The hilt is wrapped in dark leather, with a skull-shaped pommel that glows with an eerie blue light.

special_effects.soul_steal: 20% chance to steal a portion of the target's health and add it to the wielder's health.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Leather Armor
description: A set of basic leather armor for minimal protection.
looks: The leather armor consists of a chest piece, arm guards, and leg guards made of hardened leather. It is a simple and lightweight armor that provides basic protection.

name: Enchanted Bow
description: A bow infused with magical enchantments.
looks: The bow has a sleek design with intricate symbols etched onto the limbs. It emanates a soft, ethereal glow.

special_weapon_skills.Enchantment Mastery: Increases the potency of enchantments applied to the bow.

special_effects.magic_arrow: Arrows fired from this bow have a chance to deal additional magical damage.

name: Dagger of Poison
description: A deadly dagger coated with a poisonous substance.
looks: The dagger has a small and sleek blade, perfect for quick and precise attacks. The blade is covered in a dark green poison that glimmers in the light.

special_effects.poisonous_strike: Has a chance to poison the target, causing damage over time.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that can harness the power of the elements.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft with intricate carvings of the four elements - fire, water, air, and earth. At the top of the staff, there is a crystal orb that glows with a soft, multicolored light.

special_effects.elemental_burst: Allows the wielder to unleash a powerful burst of elemental energy.

name: Locket of Memories
description: A special locket that holds cherished memories and provides a sense of comfort and nostalgia.
looks: The locket is made of delicate silver and has intricate engravings on the front. It opens to reveal space for two small pictures or keepsakes.

special_effects.nostalgia: Provides a boost to happiness and morale.

name: Enchanted Bow
description: A bow infused with magical enchantments.
looks: The bow has a sleek design with a shimmering golden frame. The limbs of the bow glows with a soft blue light, indicating its magical properties.

special_weapon_skills.Archery: Increases accuracy and damage with bows.

special_effects.critical_shot: Has a chance to deal critical damage with each shot.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that radiates healing energy.
looks: The staff is made of shimmering white wood, adorned with intricate carvings of healing symbols. It glows with a soft golden light.

special_effects.aura_of_healing: Radiates an aura of healing that increases health regeneration for nearby allies.
